name: The Darkest Tower
description:
A Evil Necromancer corrupted a town, find his tower to eliminate him.

Controls:
Right click zombies to see their field of view and sneak around them.
Walk by left-clicking
Choose your fighter with "1", "2" or "3"

rotate camera with "A" and "D"
Shoot arrows by hovering over a zombie and pressing "E"
Select traps or potions in the on-screen-menu and hope they work >u<

Get to the tower to finish the 1st level. (Just search for the nearest zombie and go in that direction)
Have fun!
